title: TFR Ep. 623: Barbarian, Pinocchio, 5 Favorite Disney Characters
description:
This week on the First Run, Chris and Matt discuss the latest indie horror darling, ‘Barbarian’.  Is it a Gen Z, ultra-meta Air BnB critique that’s too clever for its own good?  Or is it a surprisingly effective gem?  Your favorite internet uncles will fill you in. Then it’s on to the latest entry in the Tom Hanks does a bad accent canon, the “live-action” Pinocchio. As always, we’ll run down the upcoming releases on Physical Media, featuring the Straight to DVD and Streaming Picks of the Week.  Matt and Chris then wrap up the show by sharing their Top 5 Disney (not Pixar) Characters. It’s gonna’ be a humdinger folks. So book those reservations, make sure your flashlight has fresh batteries, and hope for the best!

00:00-13:21: Intro/Barbarian

13:22-28:45: Physical Media & Darkplace

28:46-38:36: Pinocchio (Zemeckis)

38:37-51:38: 5 Favorite Disney Characters

51:39-53:44: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Or is it a surprisingly effective gem?  Your favorite internet uncles will fill you in. Then it’s on to the latest entry in the Tom Hanks does a bad accent canon, the “live-action” Pinocchio. Matt and Chris then wrap up the show by sharing their Top 5 Disney (not Pixar) Characters. It’s gonna’ be a humdinger folks.
